description: He and his wife, Dorothy, turned a walk-up store in Westchester, N.Y., into a 100-outlet behemoth that reached $1 billion in annual sales.

description: Dominick Black, a friend of Mr. Rittenhouse, had been accused of two felonies for buying the weapon. In a plea deal with prosecutors, he will pay a fine.

description: Nicknamed “Diamond Calves,” he was the first Black man to win the Mr. America contest. As a gay man, he said, he also felt bigotry over his sexual orientation.

description: Having served as a hitting coach in the team’s system, Rachel Balkovec will be the first woman to manage a team in affiliated baseball.

description: In a little over four years as the Giants general manager, Gettleman failed to hire a successful head coach. His replacement may soon get the chance.

name: We’re All ‘Experts’ Now. That’s Not a Good Thing.
description: Any good carnival psychic can tell you that anything is true at the right level of abstraction. Some of us mortals, though, live below the fold of abstract universal truths. Human beings may simply be base animals who will trade their livelihoods for a wooden nickel ginned up by The Man to keep us all down.

He finagled his way into an on-camera gig as a sidekick to Bill O’Reilly, before expanding his ambush-style man-on-the-street interviews into a weekend program and a role as co-host of the talk show “The Five.

name: 過去的一年，你「萎靡」了嗎？
description: 處於萎靡狀態的部分危險在於，人們可能不會注意到對愉悅的遲鈍或驅動力的減弱，不會發現自己正在慢慢陷入孤獨；人們對自己的心灰意冷無動於衷。人們看不到自己的痛苦時，就不會尋求幫助，甚至不會採取多少自助行動。 讓人萎靡的原因以及如何將其治癒，我們仍有很多要學的東西，但給它起個名字可能是第一步。起名字有助於我們消除認識上的模糊，讓我們對了解一種曾經模糊的經歷有一個更清晰的窗口。起名字能提醒我們，不只是你一人

description: Guled Duran, a Somali, has been held in classified facilities since the C.I.A. took custody of him in 2004. He has never been charged with a crime.

description: After a decade of efforts that sharply reduced inmate populations, California is closing prisons. One town at the edge of a valley in remote northeast California whose economy is built on incarceration is waging a legal battle to keep a prison open.

name: Here/There
description: Ross Trudeau is really going places.

description: Eleven of the sport’s top figures have been unable to reach an agreement after months of negotiations, stalling hopes for more teams to be included in the national title race.

description: The two relics from the museum’s collection that are being returned to Nepal are believed to have been taken from religious sites by smugglers.

Human beings may simply be base animals who will trade their livelihoods for a wooden nickel ginned up by The Man to keep us all down.

description: Ski touring is now common on groomed slopes across the U.S., in part because of the climate crisis and the pandemic. With snow cover coming later and becoming less safe because of climate change, it’s also been harder to get into the backcountry.

description: Jameson Williams went to a tent on the sideline before heading into the locker room during the second quarter of the national championship game.

description: Audie Cornish, who signed off as a host of NPR’s news program “All Things Considered” on Friday, is heading to CNN’s new. The longtime NPR star, who had

description: What’s the deepening alliance between MAGA and cryptocurrency?

description: And on Sunday, he faced a devastating new challenge when the city had its deadliest fire in decades, and at least 17 people died, including eight children. He held two news conferences at the site of the fire in the Bronx and called for unity at a time of horrific loss.

name: Uga X made the trip to Indianapolis and met another famous bulldog, too.
description: The most famous bulldog in Indianapolis these days is Butler Blue IV, the mascot at Butler University. But don’t tell that to the Georgia fans who idolize their bulldog mascot, Uga X, also known as Que.

name: Jesse Watters Is Promoted to an Evening Slot on Fox News
description: Twenty years ago, a recent college graduate named Jesse Watters joined Fox News as a production assistant. He finagled his way into an on-camera gig as a sidekick to Bill O’Reilly, before expanding his ambush-style man-on-the-street interviews into a weekend program and a role as co-host of the talk show “The Five.

name: A Naturalist Stumbled on an Ichthyosaur Skeleton, the Largest in U.K. History
description: The fossilized remains of the marine reptile, often referred to as a “sea dragon” and believed to be 180 million years old, were discovered at a nature reserve.

name: Chicago Teachers Union President Blames Mayor for Labor Stalemate
description: Chicago public schools remained closed after negotiations stagnated between the teachers’ union and the city over in-person classes and pandemic safety.

description: Ms. Sanders, 32, will host a weekend show on the cable network, one of the first big programming moves by MSNBC’s president, Rashida Jones.

description: Australian officials hinted they may make a new attempt to cancel Djokovic’s visa, even as the tennis champion, freed from detention, returned to the court.

name: The Brightliner Makes Its Final Run
description: On Sunday, the Metropolitan Transportation Authority retired the last of the R-32 model cards. We were there for its last run.

name: Despite safety measures, space heaters remain a fire risk.

description: Roughly 200 firefighters responded to the scene after a fire broke out at a 120-unit apartment building. Officials said it was caused by a space heater, sparking one of New York City’s worst fires in recent memory.

description: On Sunday, the Metropolitan Transportation Authority retired the last of the R-32 model cards. We were there for its last run.

name: Despite safety measures, space heaters remain a fire risk.
description: Space heaters are a common fixture in many New York City apartments, providing extra warmth for many residents when temperatures plunge. But these convenient heating sources can also pose a significant fire risk.

description: The family of Novak Djokovic celebrated an Australian judge’s decision to reinstate his visa, though government officials warned they could still cancel it again.

description: Roughly 200 firefighters responded to the scene after a fire broke out at a 120-unit apartment building. Officials said it was caused by a space heater, sparking one of New York City’s worst fires in recent memory.

name: 過去的一年，你「萎靡」了嗎？
description: 處於萎靡狀態的部分危險在於，人們可能不會注意到對愉悅的遲鈍或驅動力的減弱，不會發現自己正在慢慢陷入孤獨；人們對自己的心灰意冷無動於衷。人們看不到自己的痛苦時，就不會尋求幫助，甚至不會採取多少自助行動。 讓人萎靡的原因以及如何將其治癒，我們仍有很多要學的東西，但給它起個名字可能是第一步。起名字有助於我們消除認識上的模糊，讓我們對了解一種曾經模糊的經歷有一個更清晰的窗口。起名字能提醒我們，不只是你一人

name: 过去的一年，你“萎靡”了吗？
description: 处于萎靡状态的部分危险在于，人们可能不会注意到对愉悦的迟钝或驱动力的减弱，不会发现自己正在慢慢陷入孤独；人们对自己的心灰意冷无动于衷。人们看不到自己的痛苦时，就不会寻求帮助，甚至不会采取多少自助行动。 让人萎靡的原因以及如何将其治愈，我们仍有很多要学的东西，但给它起个名字可能是第一步。起名字有助于我们消除认识上的模糊，让我们对了解一种曾经模糊的经历有一个更清晰的窗口。起名字能提醒我们，不只是你一人
